thread.title: Hawaii Tourism Authority announces search for new VP, Marketing and Product Development
thread.title_full: Hawaii Tourism Authority announces search for new VP, Marketing and Product Development

author: eTN Editor
title: Hawaii Tourism Authority announces search for new VP, Marketing and Product Development
text:
Hawaii Tourism Authority announces search for new VP, Marketing and Product Development Adv: 
Aug 01, 2015 Adv: 
HONOLULU, Hawaii - The Hawaii Tourism Authority (HTA), the state of Hawaii's tourism agency, is looking to fill its vice president, marketing and product development position, which is responsible for overseeing the organization's marketing and product development activities worldwide. 
"Tourism is one of the state's largest economic drivers, and it is imperative that we find an individual with excellent leadership skills and proven expertise who will guide and maintain the success of our destination marketing efforts," said George D. Szigeti, HTA president and CEO. "We welcome applicants who have extensive experience developing and implementing collaborative and effective partnerships and programs with both public and private organizations, and will establish rapport with our board, staff, contractors and industry stakeholders."
